text: 21.2: Ais 52.1; 61.10; Ga 4.26; Hi 11.10; 11.16; 12.22; VB 3.12; 21.10Gu mbara Fhe Bakɨmen ŋgu bakɨme gari. Ana Zerusareman kam ma. Gu ana garim, ana Fhe Bakɨme phorga kegap, Heven thav zeri. Ana guigira sɨɨn vhuuŋ ki. Ana mbik won manan rɨgɨr zav wo thɨthɨm tɨgap sɨɨn vhuuaŋ muuŋgi sɨɨŋ fara muuŋgi.
